text: Aule Group uses cookies to help Aule Group identify and track visitors, their usage of Aule Group website, and their website access preferences.

Credit cards, addresses, and other such identifying information is never collected.
In each case, Aule Group collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor's interaction with Aule Group.
Aule Group retains your personal information for as long as it is necessary in order to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected.
We may retain your personal information for longer if it turns out to be the subject of a legal claim, or may otherwise be relevant for future litigation.

data_type: statistic about behavior of visitor to website
text: Aule Group may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its websites.
